actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

official_title: To provide for the inclusion of restraints on stainless steel sheet and strip of 60 inch width in the coverage of new existing bilateral agreements.

summary.text: Amends the Steel Import Stabilization Act to require the United States Trade Representative to request the inclusion of restraints on stainless steel sheet and strip in the coverage of each bilateral arrangement between the United States and steel exporting nations that imposes quantitative limitations on steel exports to the United States.

titles.title: To provide for the inclusion of restraints on stainless steel sheet and strip of 60 inch width in the coverage of new existing bilateral agreements.
